parametrized_description: A construction company uses cows and elephants to carry bricks. Each cow can carry BrickCapacityCow bricks and each elephant can carry BrickCapacityElephant bricks. The number of elephants cannot exceed MaxElephantsToCowsRatio times the number of cows, and the number of cows cannot exceed MaxCowsToElephantsRatio times the number of elephants. The company needs to transport at least RequiredBricks bricks. Determine the minimum number of animals, cows, and elephants required.

BrickCapacityCow.description: Number of bricks a cow can carry on its back

BrickCapacityElephant.description: Number of bricks an elephant can carry on its back

MaxElephantsToCowsRatio.description: Maximum ratio of elephants to cows

MaxCowsToElephantsRatio.description: Maximum ratio of cows to elephants

RequiredBricks.description: Minimum number of bricks to transport

constraints.description: Each cow can carry BrickCapacityCow bricks and each elephant can carry BrickCapacityElephant bricks. The total number of bricks transported must be at least RequiredBricks.
The number of elephants cannot exceed MaxElephantsToCowsRatio times the number of cows.
The number of cows cannot exceed MaxCowsToElephantsRatio times the number of elephants.

objective.description: Minimize the total number of animals (cows and elephants) required to transport at least RequiredBricks bricks while adhering to the specified ratio constraints between cows and elephants.
